title: How does a lie become the truth? - Quora

response.answer_text: When it is written by someone in different time frame. What ever written 100 -200 years back we now take it as history. Same History we learn in books and so on. Then we believe that it’s true.. and lie become truth. We don’t know what stories were cooked up related to history and mythology in that time frame but we think those are true. So what ever lie of that time is now truth.

When the same lie is repeated over and over again and you have some supporters willing to blindly follow whatever you say or tell them to do. We have so many examples in India to prove the hypothesis.. Thanks
